website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive tool kit that comes with a number of the most essential tools needed for HVAC work.
pros: This impressively curated HVAC technician tool kit is affordably priced yet still provides a wide assortment of quality tools that could help launch a career
Many of the specialty tools included in this offering are not found in other kits
cons: This is primarily designed to be a starter kit for the young HVAC technician
Seasoned technicians may prefer purchasing tools à la carte

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: What I don't like cupling kit instead of a swagging kit but beyond that happy with it. Its not garbage tools but a starter kit you can augment with 20 dollars at a time. I look at as a break torque kit so I don't mess up my nicer tools or a kit I would bring to a high theft area.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Gauges suck and returned but no refund yet
customer_reviews.text: I started a return for the gauge only and it’s been over two weeks. And no refund yet. I purchased this set for my son for school. When he plugs up the gauges they were not working. So I have recently just returned the gauges and that’s it. I’m not sure how the refund will work for that. But now I have to go purchase another gauge for school.
customer_reviews.author: Shekeela Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother after someone stole his other tool kit. He said it works well so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha31

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say he was like a kid in candyshop
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a very special young man,starting a new career. Needless to say he was like a kid in candyshop. Very impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: debra burzese

customer_reviews.title: Missing larts
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in time but the protective glasses where nit there.
customer_reviews.author: Gg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with all of the items that come with this order
customer_reviews.author: Mario Mata

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best bag for your buck everything has worked great so far
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the kit was there as advertised and all of the tools are high quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Turano

customer_reviews.title: GREAT starter for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was what it was supposed to be, very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in except for the gauge manifold. The rest of the set itself was not that bad. Maybe try them out to see if they send everything.
customer_reviews.author: G4:26/R21:9/R22:17

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. The multimeter wasn't of the greatest of quality. Everything else was pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: peter b copeland

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad set for the price though
customer_reviews.text: Gauges are mediocre. Not a bad set for the price though
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Murray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap chinesium garbage. You can assemble a better kit from harbor ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap chinesium garbage. You can assemble a better kit from harbor freight and they will replace it if it breaks. What kind of master hvac kit doesn't have nut drivers?
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: not worth it at all
customer_reviews.text: The gauges are analog and the hoses are not low loss fittings. The tubing bender is just about useless because you can bend 3/8" tubing by hand. The flaring tool is very cheap with no self ratcheting or depth gauge. The electric meter is very cheap as well and I wouldn't expect or trust the calibration on if for very long if at all. The tools in this kit could be purchased separately for around 100$ Hardly an expert set lok, no micron gauge, service wrench, mini split adapters, low loss hoses, de burring tool, core tool, thermometer, sheet metal tools, jumpers, Gallo gun, swaggers, fin combs, magnetic nut drivers, mirror and missing a lot more
customer_reviews.author: eri

product_meta.title: Elenco HVAC Technician Master Tool Kit # TK-8500
product_meta.description: Quality refrigeration/air-conditioning products and tube working tools, in a durable, portable tool bag. It features 17 pockets of variable sizes to store your tools and equipment.
feature_bullets: Includes: Gauge manifold (with hose),Portable tool bag, Clamp meter with temperature
6" Long nose pliers, Safety goggles, Deluxe wire stripper, 8" Adjustable wrench
10" locking pliers, Linesman Pliers, 6-in-1 Driver set, 6pc. Screwdriver set
Mini tubing cutter, Tube working kit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
